about_iris.name: Iris
about_iris.tagline: AI-powered portfolio assistant built from scratch
about_iris.what_it_is: Iris is Mike's custom-built AI assistant that helps visitors explore his portfolio in a conversational, intuitive way. Rather than traditional navigation, Iris uses natural language to answer questions about Mike's work, experience, and projects.
about_iris.why_built: Mike built Iris to provide a seamless, modern experience that showcases his technical abilities firsthand. Instead of just talking about his skills in AI, RAG systems, and modern web development, Iris demonstrates them in real-time on his portfolio.

key_features: Semantic search using OpenAI embeddings over structured knowledge base
Real-time streaming responses with GPT-4 Turbo
Command palette interface (⌘K) for instant access
Intelligent context retrieval with weighted ranking
GitHub integration for live development activity

about_iris.user_experience: Visitors can press ⌘K (or click the Iris button) to ask questions like 'What projects has Mike built?', 'Tell me about his experience', or 'How can I contact him?'. Iris provides accurate, contextual answers drawn from Mike's actual portfolio data.
about_iris.philosophy: Iris embodies Mike's approach to building products: thoughtful, user-centric, technically sophisticated, and designed to solve real problems. It's not just a feature—it's a live demonstration of how Mike works and thinks as an engineer.
